name: sdl2-mixer
description: Multi-channel audio mixer library for SDL.

fluidsynth.description: Use FluidSynth to play MIDI audio format.

libflac.description: Use libflac to play FLAC audio format instead of the built-in dr_flac.

libmodplug.description: Support for MOD audio format using libmodplug.

libvorbis.description: Use libvorbis to play OGG Vorbis audio format instead of the built-in stb_vorbis.

mpg123.description: Use mpg123 to play MP3 audio format instead of the built-in dr_mp3.

nativemidi.description: Support for MIDI audio format on Windows and macOS.

opusfile.description: Support for Opus audio format using opusfile.
